title: Senior Production Designer
content:
We're looking for a Senior Production Designer to join our US-based creative team. They should be able to build pixel-perfect files for digital and other design executions. They can move fluidly in a Mac OS environment, between applications in Adobe Creative Suite as well as Google apps. This is a role where they’ll partner with our creative and account management teams; to define specs, efficiencies, processes, and templates within our clients’ brand guidelines. They will guide and mentor other production designers within the team. Attention to detail, solid ownership, and a thirst for building consistent, quality work is a must. 
What you’ll do:

Take direction from Creative Leads and Art Directors to finalize deliverables
Design within established ad templates and create new comps as needed
Audit creative and build template systems to optimize efficiency
Create new and optimize existing design processes 
Assemble email layouts using email creation tool
Receive photo assets and apply image retouching
Prepare and deliver clean files for digital and out-of-home outputs
Organize and archive files and assets internally
Lead and provide guidance, training, and mentorship to other production designers
Work in a fast-paced environment and effectively manage multiple complex, time-sensitive projects 
Maintain consistent creative quality in all aspects of work
Interact with project managers to receive and react to client feedback
Work hours would be adjusted closer to PST work hours

Who we’re looking for: 

5+ years of experience in digital and print production in an agency setting
Advanced English proficiency
Bachelor's degree (or equivalent training) in Graphic Design
Ability to work through multiple iterations and with speed and efficiency
Ability to work independently, but also be an excellent collaborator
An understanding of visually engaging design aesthetic
Expert knowledge of Figma, Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop), and Sketch
Full understanding of email creation tools such as Knak. (If not familiar with Knak, training will be provided and fluency will be expected)
Knowledge of HTML email and digital banner production is a plus
Fluent in Google G Suite, including Drive, Docs, Slides, and Sheets 
Complete “OCD-like” attitude when it comes to file organization; managing multiple files, versions, naming conventions, and assets groups
A brand steward champion; ability to interpret and follow brand and process guidelines 
Solid understanding of typography, color spaces, and page layout
Motion graphics experience using After Effects and Premiere Pro is a plus
Good communication skills
Humble attitude—No egos here!

#LI-SS2 #LI-HybridAbout Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.

Responsible that all your personnel apply information security in accordance with the established information security policy
